# Syntax:
# #blah = comment
# /foo bar baz = command
# foo = single char
#
# Commands:
#   /country g t AGGR STRICT
#      Specify country:
#           g = China, t = Taiwan, j = Japan, k = Korea, in order of preference
#           AGGR   = aggressively search for that country in redirections
#                     (wanted for Chinese versions of Kangxi radicals but infeasible)
#           STRICT = need specific country and don’t settle on default
#           UHAN   = filter using UniHan base: no Chinese in Unicode → use Japanese etc
#
#   /range hex-from hex-to
#      Same as hex-from, hex-from+1, etc.
#
#   /fixup hex ALERT
#      Fix up some character, SHOULD EXIST
#      (ranges/lists are created en masse, then bad chars are hand-checked)
#


# Kangxi radicals, just need because of bad hinting and country-specific troubles
# Make these region-agnostic
/country
/range 2F00 2FD5


# Normal template u*.svg
/country g t j k v s STRICT UHAN
